blogPost.excerpt: - Ref Career is a tool to maximise your chances of getting referred to an opening in any firm looking for candidates. - Get in touch with employees currently working with the firm willing to refer a potential candidate for the job opening.
blogPost.body: - Ref Career is a tool to maximise your chances of getting referred to an opening in any firm looking for candidates. - Get in touch with employees currently working with the firm willing to refer a potential candidate for the job opening.
blogPost.title: refCareer - Online database for referrals
blogPost.author: SARVESH DUBEY

localize.description: -推荐人职业生涯是一种工具，可以最大限度地增加你获得任何寻找候选人的公司空缺的机会。-联系目前在公司工作的员工，他们愿意推荐潜在的候选人来填补职位空缺。
-推薦人職業生涯是一種工具，可以最大限度地增加你獲得任何尋找候選人的公司空缺的機會。-聯繫目前在公司工作的員工，他們願意推薦潛在的候選人來填補職位空缺。

previous.excerpt: The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is an evidence-based motivational cum productivity tool designed to force you to finish a task everyday. The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is designed to break your procrastination habits by forcing you to complete one task everyday
previous.title: Fuckin' Kill It Calendar 2021 edition - Calendar that helps you get shit done

localize.description: 该死的杀死它的日历是一个以证据为基础的激励和生产力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一项任务。“他妈的杀了它日历”旨在通过强迫你每天完成一项任务来打破你的拖延症习惯
localize.tagline: 帮助你完成垃圾任务的日历

localize.description: 該死的殺死它的日曆是一個以證據爲基礎的激勵和生產力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一項任務。“他媽的殺了它日曆”旨在通過強迫你每天完成一項任務來打破你的拖延症習慣
localize.tagline: 幫助你完成垃圾任務的日曆

next.excerpt: Hacker News Front Page Explorer is a database of Ranked Hacker News Front Page posts. Some Example Use Cases:- - find ways to rank your post on the Front Page - discover top trends in HN Community. - build an App using this data
next.title: Hacker News Front Page Explorer - A database of top ranking Hacker News front page posts

localize.description: 黑客新闻头版资源管理器是一个排名的黑客新闻头版帖子的数据库。一些示例用例：--找到在首页对您的帖子进行排名的方法--发现HN社区的热门趋势。-使用此数据构建应用程序
localize.tagline: 排名靠前的黑客新闻头版帖子数据库

localize.description: 黑客新聞頭版資源管理器是一個排名的黑客新聞頭版帖子的數據庫。一些示例用例：--找到在首頁對您的帖子進行排名的方法--發現HN社區的熱門趨勢。-使用此數據構建應用程序
localize.tagline: 排名靠前的黑客新聞頭版帖子數據庫
